description: The Civil Engineering department has already introduced the Civengs club, which has been designed to hone the creative skills of the budding civil engineers and to convert abstract ideas into tangible works of art Civengs , the only official Civil Club of Chitkara University. The objective is harnessing the creative abilities of civil engineering students. Civil engineers are in the forefront of technology. They are the leading users of sophisticated high-tech products â€“ applying the very latest concepts in computer-aided design (CAD) during design, construction, project scheduling, and cost control.

portfolio.name: Test of a construction material made of a mixture of cement, sand, stone, and water that hardens to a stone like mass
Dreaming of being one of those masterminds in designing? Take up the challenge and figure out the plan of the simple house according to the given problem statement on the spot
